derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from the noun bar, perhaps on the pattern of minister

entry.tran: （英格兰和威尔士地区有资格在高等法院出庭的）大律师，讼务律师
entry.def: In England and Wales, a barrister is a lawyer who represents clients in the higher courts of law.

means.word_mean: 1. a British lawyer who speaks in the higher courts of law
